changes.rationale: Reduces choice overload while keeping a clear next step; improves scannability and convers...

changes.value: Use 16px body text with line-height 1.5 and max line length of 75ch to enhance readability
changes.rationale: Improves clarity and reduces cognitive load for users

changes.value: Implement a primary button style with 20px padding and 4px border radius
changes.rationale: Creates a premium feel while ensuring buttons are visually distinct

changes.value: Select a neutral palette with soft grays and off-whites to enhance calmness
Use rounded chips with 14px text and 10px padding to signal trust
Introduce a structured audit log preview pattern with timestamp and action icons
changes.rationale: Enhances user confidence by providing a clear record of actions

changes.value: Use 1px solid dividers with a neutral color to create separation
changes.rationale: Enhances clarity and organization of content

changes.value: Apply a consistent 8px border radius to all interactive elements to foster a friendly
changes.rationale: Enhances user experience by making elements feel more touch-friendly

issues.description: Hero 2-column grid may fail 8-second comprehension test if bullets are too technical
issues.rationale: Scannable bullets must instantly communicate value without requiring domain knowledge parsing

issues.description: Sticky CTA appears at 40% scroll but primary hero CTA may already be lost on mobile
issues.rationale: Gap between hero CTA disappearing and sticky appearing creates conversion drop-off zone

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks context for non-technical users who don't understand audit trails
issues.rationale: Technical observability features may confuse small business owners unfamiliar with audit concepts

issues.description: Proof bar placement under hero creates visual hierarchy conflict with primary CTA
issues.rationale: Trust elements competing with conversion elements may dilute focus and reduce CTA click-through

issues.description: Pricing table standardization removes differentiation cues between tiers
issues.rationale: Uniform card design may make tier selection harder and reduce upselling to higher plans

issues.description: Problem/Solution merge may eliminate emotional hooks that drive urgency
issues.rationale: Condensing pain points reduces emotional resonance needed for immediate action

issues.description: 75ch max line length may be too wide for mobile scanning comfort
issues.rationale: Optimal mobile line length is 45-55ch for thumb-scroll reading patterns

issues.description: 20px button padding may create tap target issues on smaller mobile screens
issues.rationale: Minimum 44px tap targets required for mobile accessibility and conversion optimization

issues.description: How It Works stepper may require horizontal scrolling on mobile if steps are too wide
issues.rationale: Horizontal scrolling breaks mobile scanning flow and reduces completion rates

issues.description: Soft grays in neutral palette may reduce CTA contrast and visual dominance
issues.rationale: Low contrast backgrounds can diminish primary action visibility and conversion rates

suggestedFixes.fix: Test hero bullets with 5-word maximum per bullet and benefit-focused language for 8-second clarity
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures instant value comprehension without cognitive load

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA at 25% scroll and add fade-in animation to maintain conversion continuity
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces conversion gap and provides smoother transition experience

suggestedFixes.fix: Add explanatory microcopy above audit log: 'See every action taken on your business setup'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides context for non-technical users to understand audit value

suggestedFixes.fix: Place proof bar between hero and Problem/Solution sections to avoid CTA competition
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains trust building while preserving hero conversion focus

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Most Popular' badge and 10% visual emphasis to middle tier for clear differentiation
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guides tier selection while maintaining visual consistency

suggestedFixes.fix: Retain emotional pain points in Problem section, add Solution section with 3 clear benefits
suggestedFixes.rationale: Preserves emotional hooks while improving clarity and flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Set mobile max line length to 50ch and desktop to 75ch using responsive CSS
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes reading comfort across all device sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase mobile button padding to 24px vertical to ensure 44px minimum tap target
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets accessibility standards and improves mobile conversion rates

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single-column vertical stepper on mobile with 300px max width per step
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scrolling and maintains mobile scanning flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio between neutral backgrounds and primary CTA colors
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains accessibility while preserving CTA visual dominance
